divs: sighting detailssorry but i want to explain in spanish(im from argentina). estaba dormida ,eran las 5 am,cuando de repente siento que al lado de mi cama hay dos personas,muy bajas ,sin pelo,y muy desgadas,en la oscuridad llegue a verlos con dificultad,uno de ellos puso un dedo en mi frente y salio de uno de los dedos ,una aguja muy fina ,la cual penetro mi craneo,en la parte de la frente,me dolio,y no podia llegar a abrir bien los ojos,pero llegaba a verlos,ya q mi habitacion no era tan oscura y se filtraba luz desde afuera,fue rapido,cuando me sacaron la aguja ,ellos se desintregraron en pequenas particulas en la oscuridad,fue rarisimo. espero puedan traducir esta nota con respecto a mi experiencia,creo q existen y no tengo miedo. --------------------------- translation.7\23\2010: writer was assigned this case because the reporter is from argentina and felt better to explain herself in the spanish language. the report indicates that this event occurred in the state of texas, city of houston in harris county, in april,2006. the reports states that as,the reporter,she was lying in bed sleeping at about five am (5 am)she noticed that two(2) entities-beings, very slim and short in stature, were by her side. one placed a finger on her forehead. a very thin needle protruded from the finger on the forehead penetrating her scull and produced immense pain. she was still able to see them due to some light from another room. shortly thereafter the needle was retracted and the finger was removed from her forehead. immediately thereafter the two (2) beings desintegrated into small particles. she believes that they exist and she is not afraid. writer will be interviewing reporter via telephone in near future. investigation continues.... hector j. trujillo, fi, fl
